name: ISSDistanceFromMe
0:
”Alexa, open space station”
”how far is the space station”
”what address is set for this device”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: space station
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill uses your device's location to calculate exactly how far the International Space Station (ISS) is.

Have you ever looked up at the sky and wondered how far some of the things out there are? Well, me too. One "thing" I've always been interested in is the International Space Station because humans actually live up there. Satisfy your curiosity by saying "Alexa, ask Space Station how far away it is" to receive the real-time distance between you and the ISS.

Thank you for your interest in space!

NOTE: For this skill to work, you'll have to enable device location permissions. The device location that will be used in the distance calculation is whatever you have manually input as the device location. Please ensure that the address is accurate.

If you have any feedback, suggestions, or general concerns please reach out to our team at contact@sublimitylabs.com!
